sources.title: Tai ji ba jiao (1979)
sources.description: Eight thieves steal a treasure map and split it into eight pieces, vowing to regroup three years later. But they'll have to deal with a deadly-kicking cop. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/tai-ji-ba-jiao-1979/

metadata.Plot: A band of robbers steal a treasure map and split it into eight pieces, one for each member, and vow to regroup three years later. But a determined cop will stop at nothing to hunt down the criminals.
metadata.Actors: Tao-Liang Tan, Chun-Erh Lung, Lieh Lo
